ActCanada Labour Code
PrecisReappointment of SONIA GAAL of Orleans, Ontario, to be a full-time member of the Canada Industrial Relations Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of one month; and order that SONIA GAAL be deemed to be employed in the Public Service for the purposes of the Public Service Superannuation Act; effective August 2, 2005.
